name: Maple Glen Bridle Trail
description: Maple Glen Bridle Trail offers a stunning foliage-filled route west of Alum Creek.

name: Horseshoe Falls Trail
description: Hike through a winding river trail to reach the pristine Horseshoe Falls. For those who enjoy fishing and a full day of adventure, Horseshoe Falls Trail will become a favorite.

name: Kokosing Gap Trail
description: The Kokosing Gap Trail is a paved, 14-mile recreational trail built on a former Pennsylvania Railroad line with endpoints in Mount Vernon and Danville, Ohio.
